Table content:
Hardware | PCI/USB ID | Working?
GPU | 8086:9a49 | Yes
Wireless | 8086:a0f0 | Yes
Bluetooth | 8087:0026 | Yes
Audio | 8086:a0c8 | Yes
Touchpad | 093a:0255 | Yes
Card Reader | 0bda:0316 | Yes
Webcam | 04f2:b71a | Yes
IR Camera | 04f2:b71a | Yes

sections.title: GPU
sections.content: Add i915.enable_psr=0 to the kernel command line to the kernel command line if you are experiencing flickering, artifacts or low GPU performance.

sections.title: Function keys
sections.content:
The most Fn function keys work out of the box. For the Fn function keys F10, F11 and F12 the following must be set as kernel parameter (unless tuxedo-drivers-dkmsAUR is installed):

```
acpi_os_name=Linux acpi_osi=
```

sections.title: TUXEDO Control Center
sections.content: See TUXEDO InfinityBook Pro 15v4#TUXEDO Control Center.

sections.title: Suspend
sections.content:
See Power management/Suspend and hibernate#Changing suspend method.

Read more at the help page from TUXEDO [1].
